Name: The Practice Book for Conceptual Physics

ReviewList.Text: This practice book is actually helpful!  I liked all the different practice problems to help me better understand my physics book!  All of the answers are in the back of the book so you don't have to guess weather you got them right or not.
Definitely has helped with my class - worth every cent!  It does have the answers in the back if one wants to know.
This is a great addition to the textbook. Although the textbook has plenty of exercises, this practice book adds other problems which don't appear in the textbook. I'm glad I bought it.
It has a good format with the answers but doesn't cover a lot of subjects that are in the textbook.
Gives a lot of practice problems, but does not explain how to do any of them or why they are solved in such a way. Unless you already know how to work the problems, this book is useless.
I am learning a lot about basic physics.  Love the illustrations and examples. I hope to learn basic physics concepts.
I ordered an actual book but received a practice book. I was disappointed because it was useless for me. thanks
WAS PRETTY RIPPED AND WORN AROUND THE EDGES.  FEEL LIKE I COULD HAVE GOTTEN A BETTER PRODUCT FOR MY MONEY
